rules.raw: alert http any any -> any any (msg:"Possible SQL Injection Attack"; content:"union select"; nocase; classtype:web-application-attack; priority:1; sid:1000001; rev:1;)
alert http any any -> any any (msg:"XSS Attack Detected"; content:"<script>"; nocase; http_uri; classtype:web-application-attack; priority:1; sid:1000002; rev:1;)

alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"Malware Download - Suspicious .exe"; content:".exe"; http_uri; flow:established,to_client; classtype:trojan-activity; priority:1; sid:1000003; rev:1;)

drop tcp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET 22 (msg:"SSH Brute Force Attempt"; flow:to_server,established; threshold:type threshold, track by_src, count 10, seconds 60; classtype:attempted-admin; priority:1; sid:1000004; rev:1;)

alert tcp any any -> any 3389 (msg:"RDP Connection Attempt"; flow:to_server,established; threshold:type limit, track by_src, count 1, seconds 300; classtype:attempted-admin; priority:2; sid:1000005; rev:1;)
alert dns any any -> any any (msg:"DNS Query for Known Malware Domain"; dns.query; content:"malware-c2.example.com"; nocase; classtype:trojan-activity; priority:1; sid:1000006; rev:1;)
alert tls any any -> any any (msg:"Suspicious TLS Certificate - Self Signed"; tls.cert_subject; content:"CN=localhost"; classtype:suspicious-login; priority:2; sid:1000007; rev:1;)

alert http any any -> any any (msg:"File Upload Attempt"; content:"Content-Type: multipart/form-data"; http_header; content:"filename="; distance:0; classtype:web-application-activity; priority:3; sid:1000008; rev:1;)

alert smtp any any -> any 25 (msg:"Email with Suspicious Attachment"; content:"Content-Type: application/"; content:".exe"; distance:0; within:100; classtype:suspicious-filename-detect; priority:2; sid:1000009; rev:1;)
alert tcp any any -> any [1:1024] (msg:"Port Scan Detected"; flags:S; threshold:type both, track by_src, count 20, seconds 60; classtype:attempted-recon; priority:2; sid:1000010; rev:1;)
alert icmp any any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ICMP Ping Sweep"; itype:8; threshold:type threshold, track by_src, count 10, seconds 5; classtype:attempted-recon; priority:3; sid:1000011; rev:1;)
alert http any any -> any any (msg:"Directory Traversal Attempt"; content:"../"; http_uri; nocase; classtype:web-application-attack; priority:1; sid:1000012; rev:1;)
alert http any any -> any any (msg:"Command Injection Attempt"; content:"; "; http_uri; content:"wget "; distance:0; nocase; classtype:web-application-attack; priority:1; sid:1000013; rev:1;)
alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET 445 (msg:"SMB Connection from External Network"; flow:to_server,established; classtype:policy-violation; priority:2; sid:1000014; rev:1;)
alert http any any -> any any (msg:"Cryptocurrency Mining Script Detected"; content:"coinhive"; nocase; http_uri; classtype:trojan-activity; priority:1; sid:1000015; rev:1;)

description: Sample Suricata rules for demonstration and testing
